item.title: Wiz Secures $100M Series B Led by Insight Partners
item.description: Cloud security startup Wiz announced today it has raised $100 million in Series B funding led by Insight Partners, with participation from Cyberstarts.

item.title: New Zero-Day Vulnerability Discovered in Linux Kernel
item.description: Security researchers have identified a critical zero-day vulnerability affecting the Linux kernel versions 5.x and 6.x.

item.title: CrowdStrike Completes $200M Series E Round
item.description: Endpoint security leader CrowdStrike has closed a $200 million Series E round co-led by Accel and CapitalG, bringing its valuation to $3 billion.
